title: Analyze a Capital Expenditure Request
description: The FP&A team needs to analyze a request from the operations department to purchase a new piece of machinery for $500,000.

tasks.description: Gather the details of the capital expenditure request, including the cost and expected cost savings or revenue generation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the business case for the new machine.

tasks.description: Perform a financial analysis, calculating metrics like Net Present Value (NPV), Internal Rate of Return (IRR), and payback period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates a positive NPV and an IRR above the company's hurdle rate.

tasks.description: Provide a recommendation to the capital committee on whether to approve the expenditure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a report recommending approval based on the strong financial metrics.
